ques: If you have problems with pain/aches/stiffness, weakness or functional problems, desctribe this/these below.(List the symptoms in descending order with the most troublesome first)
Have you been diagnosed with this problem
Did the problem start after a physical trauma
Did the problem start after a mental trauma
How often do you experience the problem
When do you experience the problem
How intense is the experience of the problem on avaerage on a 0-10 scale
